original_title: TU leaders of BIA sent on compulsory leave
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Several trade union leaders at the Katunayake International Airport have been sent on compulsory leave.
A spokesman for the Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Aviation said 21 union leaders were sent on compulsory leave.
The measure was taken as they had engaged in activities that disrupted airport services.
